sen.j: 佐々木 千吉（ささき せんきち、1930年12月18日 -）は大蔵流（京都・茂山家）狂言師。
sen.e: Senkichi SASAKI (born on December 18, 1930 to now) is a kyogen performer of Okura-ryu (the Shigeyama family, Kyoto) (Okura school).
Senkichi SASAKI (born on December 18, 1930 to now) is a kyogen performer of Okura-ryu (the Shigeyama family, Kyoto) (Okura school).
Senkichi SASAKI (born on December 18, 1930 to now) is a kyogen performer of Okura-ryu (the Shigeyama family, Kyoto) (Okura school).

sen.j: 重要無形文化財総合指定保持者。
sen.e: He is the general holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property.
He is the general holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property.
He is the general holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property.

sen.j: 三世・茂山千作の娘婿。
sen.e: He is an adopted son-in-law of Sensaku SHIGEYAMA, the third.
He is an adopted son-in-law of Sensaku SHIGEYAMA, the third.
He is an adopted son-in-law of Sensaku SHIGEYAMA, the third.
His real name is Akira SHIBATA.
His real name is Akira SHIBATA.
His real name is Akira SHIBATA.

sen.j: 1951年、立命館大学卒業後、銀行勤務の傍ら狂言の修行に励む。
sen.e: Since he graduated from Ritsumeikan University, he has been practicing kyogen performing while he was working for a bank.
Since he graduated from Ritsumeikan University, he has been practicing kyogen performing while he was working for a bank.
Since he graduated from Ritsumeikan University, he has been practicing kyogen performing while he was working for a bank.

sen.j: 1954年からは三世・茂山千作に師事。
sen.e: He has been studying kyogen under Sensaku SHIGEYAMA since 1954.
He has been studying kyogen under Sensaku SHIGEYAMA since 1954.
He has been studying kyogen under Sensaku SHIGEYAMA since 1954.

sen.j: 同年初舞台を踏んでいる。
sen.e: In the same year (1954) he made a debut.
In the same year (1954) he made a debut.
In the same year (1954) he made a debut.

sen.j: 1999年、重要無形文化財総合指定保持者に認定された。
sen.e: In 1999, he was certified as the general holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property.
In 1999, he was certified as the general holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property.
